solution_line_template: Each drink uses {total_cups_per_drink} cups because {iced_tea_per_drink} cup + {lemonade_per_drink_whole} and {lemonade_per_drink_fraction} cup = <<{total_cups_per_drink}={total_cups_per_drink}>>{total_cups_per_drink} cups

The pitcher contains {total_drinks_in_pitcher} total drinks because {total_cups_in_pitcher} / {total_cups_per_drink} = <<{total_cups_in_pitcher}/{total_cups_per_drink}={total_drinks_in_pitcher}>>{total_drinks_in_pitcher}
There are {total_lemonade_in_pitcher} cups of lemonade in the pitcher because {total_drinks_in_pitcher} x {lemonade_per_drink_whole} and {lemonade_per_drink_fraction} = {total_lemonade_in_pitcher}
